index.desciption:
MEng. EECS at UC Berkeley

B.S. CS Student at NTHU

System Architect & Backend Tech Leader at 9dynamics

President of 7th Mei-Chu Hackathon
index.aboutMeText:
Hi! I'm pursuing master degree at UC Berkeley Electrical Engineering & Computer Sciences (EECS), and I also acquired major GPA 4.05/4.3 in my college CS degree.

During my undergraduate studies, I worked with Prof. Jerry Chou and published a paper aiming the optimize machine learning workloads with a set of custom operators, which awarded the Best Paper in CLOSER 2021.

These years I also participated in start-ups industries, giloo and 9dynamics, as a system architect and backend tech leader, and my priority is to employ microservice architecture with Kubernetes to construct reliable and flexible service.
